posts.post_content:

I have 4 Ungraded T205s for sale. Three Polar Bear backs and one Piedmont. Three have a light wrinkle or crease on the border or corner of the card. the Engle is heavily creased through the center. No paper loss on the back. The Polar Bears have tobacco stains on the reverse.

Dygert Piedmont $18.00
Olmstead Polar Bear $18.00
Scott Polar Bear $18.00
Engle Polar Bear $15.00 SOLD

$48.00 for the 3 left delivered. Paypal okay. First email gets the card.

Thanks for looking,

Joe
